name: geology to vistas
desc: The geology_to_vistas module writes the fundamental geologic grid information to a file format that Ground Water Vistas can read.

properties.name: Reverse Hierarchy
properties.desc: The Reverse Hierarchy toggle determines whether the surfaces will define layers in a normal (top to bottom) manner or reversed (if on).

properties.name: Minimum Thickness
properties.desc: The Minimum Thickness value forces layers thinner than the specified value to have a minimum thickness and therefore not pinch-out completely.

properties.name: Grid Info
properties.desc: The details of the input field that will be written to the file.
